The co-adjusting modifiers replace all modifiers, and their combat power is higher. If the [ICON_Movement] movement power allows, +1 additional attack per turn, you can move after attack, and you will not suffer combat power debuffs after injury. [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS], but it is very expensive [ENDCOLOR]

The Holy Tree Divine Domain featured area is initially unlocked, with lower cost and no price increase, and can be built regardless of population needs. After completion, the surrounding cells will be +2[ICON_Food]food +2[ICON_Production]productivity +2[ICON_Gold] gold coins

When the unit attacks, the combat power +7[ICON_Strength] is used, and the movement power +2[ICON_Movement] is used. All units in the formation obtain the movement power of the unit. The unit does not need to be stationed at the beginning of the round to recover its life. If the [ICON_Movement] movement force allows, +1 additional attack per turn. Can be moved after attack

The special support unit, based on Heimdal's key, has its own combat power, and all formation units have obtained the unit's mobility [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] The maintenance fee of this unit is extremely high, please build it with caution! [ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Research {LOC_TECH_STIRRUPS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_BALLISTICS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_SYNTHETIC_MATERIALS_NAME} can improve the combat effectiveness of the unit [ICON_Strength][NE WLINE] Research {LOC_TECH_FLIGHT_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMPUTERS_NAME} can increase the range and field of vision of the unit [ICON_Range][NEWLINE]+high mobility [NEWLINE]+high long-range combat power [NEWLINE]+able formation with military units [NEWLINE]-high maintenance fee [NEWLINE]-will be restrained by all units
Girls who dont like to communicate with others always look at the night sky quietly alone, as if they have had a dark childhood experience.

Zhiming's disciple in Sifang Academy is also her assistant. He is smart and studious, and has great achievements in institutional skills. Before awakening, I depended on my sister Yingzhao for life, witnessed the hardships my sister experienced to protect herself, and always wanted to prove herself and reduce the burden on her sister.

The lively and carefree former ghost house is the biggest troublesome spirit in the eyes of Deep Sky. She spent all her excess energy on pranks and claimed to have an air friend named "Hougui", but no one knew the existence of Hougui.

The most popular revisionist in the headquarters is affectionately called "Little Osiris". After discovering the troubles of your companions, you will do your best to give them help and always put your companions' affairs first.

The most popular revisionist in the headquarters is affectionately called "Little Osiris". After discovering the troubles of your companions, you will do your best to give them help and always put your companions' affairs first.

Leviathan, who is full of energy every day, is a little cute little cutie who occasionally becomes confused. Although she is innocent and lively, she is unexpectedly a little jealous. Please dont act too close to Vidal in front of her.

The correctionist who was brought back from a frozen area of raw materials, her life of being alone all year round made her look a little cold and withdrawn, and she seemed not very good at interpersonal communication.

Sikati is one of the few field amendments in the ninth department who was directly under the command of Hugh, and is specifically responsible for investigating signs of visual bone activity in the ocean area. Although she seems carefree on the surface, when it comes to a critical moment, she can always show the courage a captain should have.

The girl who joined the Deep Space Eye on the condition of "conducting free research and inventions" is currently in the Hidden Science Group. However, he said he was in office, but he almost didn't participate in the battle of the simultaneous body, and seemed to be only interested in inventions and tarot cards.

One of the main leaders of the Hidden Science Group developed most of the AI systems in the Deep Space Eye, including the "Mimir System". We aim to completely eliminate the body and pursue accuracy and efficiency in everything.

Hoddle, a member of the intelligence department, is a twin with his sister Baddle. Unlike her sister's cheerful and generous personality, Hodel just silently followed her sister's light and would not reveal herself too much.
He has exactly the same appearance as Osiris, but his inner dominant personality is the crazy "Pluto", with powerful power and disdain to cooperate with other revisionists.

The captain of the Deep Sky Eye "Thunder Squad" has the strongest combat power in the organization. A corrector with the ability to enter dreams and invite others into dreams. But because she herself cannot control this ability well, she is now adopted by Hades in the Muse Society, and is cared for by Hades' two puppet maids.

The actual manager of the Muse Society, responsible for coordinating and managing the various business activities of the Muse Society as a revisionist, was awe-inspired in the Parliament for its terrible character and unchanged appearance for thirty years and was called the "ageless witch".

Although it is difficult for people from the outside world to believe, Lu Liang is indeed the current president of Tianlu Trading. It is precisely because of her outstanding business ability that Tianlu Trading has gained its current status. In addition, she is also one of the heads of the Xuheng District Revisionist Organization.
In the hyperspace experiment, Weier Danti learned about her secrets and past, strengthened her belief in protecting herself, and mastered the new posture she showed.

The Human Resources Minister of Tianlu Trade is a dull person but a sharp mind and advocates efficiency in everything. Before awakening, I depended on my sister Lin Yu for life and experienced many hardships. In private, I like to travel around alone and accumulate many non-disciplined knowledge of unknown uses.

Hera, a revised member of the Muse Society, is also the famous lady in the Omofes Original Area. Because of its beautiful appearance, luxurious temperament and elegant aesthetics, it is well known among celebrities.

The agent of the Sifang Academy, Xuheng's leading scholar and scientific researcher. At the same time, he is also one of the manufacturers of Tiantong Engine and is responsible for subsequent maintenance.

The founder of Sifang Academy has long protected Xuheng. On weekdays, Gengchen will do it himself, and use her method to maintain Xuheng's stability. From agents from all parties to ordinary people, they all love her very much.

The head of the operation team of the Colgee Major Crime Countermeasures Department, has excellent intelligence acquisition capabilities. Avoid direct exchange of fire with criminals through information warfare, minimize the damage caused to civilians by combat [NEWLINE] Holding high-level authority of Colgee's intelligence department, it seems that everyone's secrets are well aware of. Once someone threatens the mission, Tott will use these secrets to remove these obstacles without any mercy, even if it uses disgraceful means.
